name: Comicbook Finder
alt: 'Life is never completely without challenges.‚Äù - Stan Lee'
description: A Comic Book Finder that is based off of a random number and some questions.

name: Football or Futbol
description: We of course took inspiration from our love of the beautiful game and want a way to compare athletes of different sports. Realizing there is no application out there, why not build it ourselves.

name: Nom Nom Nom
description: JavaScript + JQuery application that utilizes the open weather API. Application stores user info upon button click to deliver the current and 5-day forecast for the inputted city. Previous searched city is saved as a button so the user can search the same city with ease.

name: Coding Quiz
description: This is a Javascript Quiz made by using DOM's to update the questions and move to the highscore page.

name: WorkDay
description: This 9 to 5 work day planner application was made using Jquery.

name: Employee Directory
description: Basic user directory built using React and a third party API.  App is able to sort and filter information.
